channel.title: What im going to be buying!
channel.description:
this is what im buying =D iv been thinking allot and allot so yea 0_0
Fan Control: NZXT sentry fan controller $69.99 [IMG]http://www.techdigest.tv/nxt_fan_controller.jpg[/img]
video cards: EVGA 01G-P3-1280-AR GeForce GTX 280 1GB 512-bit GDDR3 PCI Express 2.0 x16 HDCP Ready SLI Supported Video Card $429.99 [IMG]http://www.mwave.com/mwave/spechr/images/AA73402a.jpg[/img] might get 2 video cards. also this one is cheaper then the XFX and better XFX: # Chipset Manufacturer: NVIDIA # Core clock: 602 MHz # Stream Processors: 240 processing cores # Memory Clock: 2210MHz # DirectX: DirectX 10 # OpenGL: OpenGL 2.1 # DVI: 2 # TV-Out: HDTV / S-Video Out # Model #: GX280NZDF9 EVGA: # Chipset Manufacturer: NVIDIA # Core clock: 602MHz # Stream Processors: 240 processing cores # Memory Clock: 2214MHz # DirectX: DirectX 10 # OpenGL: OpenGL 2.1 # DVI: 2 # TV-Out: HDTV / S-Video Out # Model #: 01G-P3-1280-AR Dvd: LG Black 6X BD-R 2X BD-RE 16X DVD+R 6X Blu-ray DVD-ROM 4MB Cache SATA Internal Blu-ray Burner Super Multi Blu-ray Disc Burner & HD DVD-ROM Drive Model GGW-H20L $224.99 [IMG]http://www.shoppingsquare.com.au/images/products/5175.jpg[/img]
i also have bought this one so no need to get another one Pioneer Gray & White USB 2.0 External 20X DVD-R Drive with LightScribe Model DVR-X152 [IMG]http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/31tS5woO6uL._SL500_AA280_.jpg[/img]
computer case: COOLER MASTER HAF 932 RC-932-KKN1-GP Black Steel ATX Full Tower Computer Case$159.99 [IMG]http://www.casingreviews.com/wp-content/uploads/cm/Cooler-Master-HAF932.jpg[/img] 1x 230mm on Front ( red LED, 700 RPM, 19dB ) 1x 230mm on Side Panel (19dB, 700 RPM) 4x 120mm on Side Panel (optional, replacing the 230mm) 1x 230mm on Top ( 19dB, 700 RPM) 2x 120mm on Top (optional, replacing the 230mm) 1x 120mm on Top (optional) 1x 140mm on Back (17dB, 1200 RPM) 1x 120mm on Back (optional, replacing the 140mm) 2x 120mm on Bottom (optional) here is a video about this case that just came out today [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eBH9IFeA0M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4eBH9IFeA0M[/url]
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 Yorkfield 2.83GHz 12MB L2 Cache LGA 775 95W Quad-Core Processor - Retail [B]$319.99[/B]
[IMG]http://www.productwiki.com/upload/images/intel_core_2_quad_q9550.jpg[/img]
Ram: GeIL Black Dragon 8GB (4 x 2GB) 240-Pin DDR2 SDRAM DDR2 800 (PC2 6400) Quad Channel Kit Desktop Memory - Retail $136.99 [IMG]http://i00.twenga.com/p/04/13/140413vb.png[/img]
Monitor: AMSUNG T260 Rose-Black 25.5" 5ms Touch of Color Series HDMI Widescreen LCD Monitor 300 cd/m2 DC 20000:1 $499.99 [IMG]http://c1.neweggimages.com/NeweggImage/ProductImageCompressAll200/24-001-276-04.jpg[/img] maybe, if im gonna buy 2 GTX's then ill get 2 monitors
key bored and mouse. Logitech G15 2-Tone 104 Normal Keys 29 Function Keys USB Wired Standard Gaming Keyboard $89.99 [IMG]http://techgasm.files.wordpress.com/2008/07/logitech-g15-gaming-keyboard-2007.jpg[/img] Logitech G9 Black 5 Buttons Tilt Wheel USB Wired Laser 3200 dpi Gaming Mouse $89.99 [IMG]http://www.coolbusinessideas.com/G9.jpg[/img]
OS: [U][B] Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium SP1 64-bit English for System Builders 1pk DSP OEI DVD $99.99 [IMG]http://www.microsoft.com/presspass/images/gallery/boxshots/web/WindowsVistaHomePremium_web.jpg[/img] [/B][/U] Motherboard: EVGA 132-YW-E178-A1 LGA 775 NVIDIA nForce 780i SLI FTW ATX Intel Motherboard $249.99 [IMG]http://www.scan.co.uk/Images/Products/850795-a.jpg[/img] Hard drive: Western Digital Caviar Black WD1001FALS 1TB 7200 RPM 32MB Cache SATA 3.0Gb/s Hard Drive $149.99 Western Digital VelociRaptor WD3000GLFS 300GB 10000 RPM 16MB Cache SATA 3.0Gb/s Hard Drive $279.99 Power Supplie: CORSAIR CMPSU-1000HX 1000W ATX12V 2.2 / EPS12V 2.91 SLI Ready CrossFire Ready 80 PLUS Certified Modular Active PFC Power Supply $249.99 [IMG]http://img.ncix.com/gif/28797.jpg[/img] might get one with lights, seance im that type of guy =p heat sink: Thermalright Ultra-120 CPU Cooling Heatsink $59.99 [IMG]http://www.quietpc.com/files/images/products/tr-ultra120extreme-large.jpg[/img] Scythe DFS123812-3000 "ULTRA KAZE" 120 x 38 mm Case Fan $9.99
this thread could be updated. i figured im gonna be playing some good computer games seance i went to a friends house and played some sick games also still gonna do video editing. don't ask me where im getting the money. i work and get paid 800$ a week. i already have some saved up. just still siting and wanna make sure i get everything right.
all from newegg.com

item.title: What im going to be buying!
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“postmanpat9, post:68, topic:239585”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=315871.msg2512426#msg2512426 date=1225358440]
Possibly swap the GTX280’s with 2x 4870x2’s.

Get some high end DDR2 (1066+) or DDR3.

Get your self the SLI FTW motherboard from eVga.

Or wait a little bit, and buy a Intel Nehalem processor, with a i7 mobo.

If your spending a lot, your gonna at least wanna use the newest socket etc.
[/quote]

…[/quote]

My bad, wrote the bottom bit before i suggested the 4870’s

get the Foxconn X58 Blood Rage.

Read full topic

for the ram, i just like to max it out. ill probably wont use all 8 gigs but i still would like to max it out.[/quote]

item.title: What im going to be buying!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:52, topic:239585”][quote author=1 hit kill link=topic=315871.msg2513080#msg2513080 date=1225402944]
i already bought some parts. im not gonna replie to post like " By boxing, you mean fighting. And by company, you mean school. So you fight at school? "

cuz the only one a child here is you.

talk all the shit. i don’t care. im gonna stay on topic.
[/quote]

Now here is your post in english (in case anyone wants to actually read it) :

I already bought some parts. I’m not going to reply to a post like " By boxing, you mean fighting. And by company, you mean school. So you fight at school? "

Because the only one who is a child here is me.

Talk all the shit you want. I don’t care. I’m going to stay on topic.

Notes to 1 hit kill:

2 spaces after a a punctuational character
Use proper grammar
Learn to spell

Here are some resources for you:

www.gtfomyinter.net

LearnEnglish - British Council

LearnEnglish - British Council

LearnEnglish provides high-quality resources to help improve your English.


Why two spaces? I have never heard that one before.

Read full topic
